short_summary: Amendment to closing time, first phase of a two-phase solicitation process for Canada Centre for Inland Waters Lift Station Upgrade - Phase 1
description: First phase of a two-phase solicitation process for Canada Centre for Inland Waters Lift Station Upgrade - Phase 1. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second phase will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.
full_summary:
=================

**Solicitation for Canada Centre for Inland Waters Lift Station Upgrade - Phase 1**
--------

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3665869125Doc3885772691
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3665869125
* **Publication Date**: February 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date**: March 10, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 1, 2023

### Notice Information

* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify (ITA)
* **Notice Status**: Expired
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (LPC)

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding (CB)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except Nation's Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Zobia Essa, PSPC/SPAC
* **Email**: zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [Ariba Discovery Posting](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15499239?extsite=MTU0OTkyMzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Tender Description**: This solicitation is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase process to evaluate supplier qualifications for the Canada Centre for Inland Waters Lift Station Upgrade. Interested suppliers are invited to submit their qualifications by the tender closing date and time. The second phase (Phase Two) will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid based on specifications and drawings.

[Addendum has been updated to note that the closing time for bids has been modified to 2:00 PM EDT on March 21, 2023. All bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive. Please consult the SAP Ariba Discovery posting for complete details.] 

Note: 
- All contact information has been requested
